评论详情: The size was wrong. They're Non-US sizing so be careful which size you pick. Based on the medium's waist size I got, I'd need to get the equivalent of an xl which they don't make. Material is light and cheap.
The material feels like a cheap cosplay and they definitely need to make better sizes or change the sizing chart…
It came on time, and in great condition. I wore these to school and had the humiliation of my life… EVERYONE could see my underwear… definitely wear leggings under..
